content: विविक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Separated, detached, disjoined, abstracted. {@--2@} Lonely, solitary, retired, sequestered. {@--3@} Single, alone. {@--4@} Distinguished, discriminated. {@--5@} Judicious {@--6@} Pure, faultless; <ls>Ratn. 1. 21.</ls> {@--7@} Profound (as a judgment or thought). {@--8@} Intent on. {@--9@} Devoid of, free from; <ls>Ku. 1. 23.</ls> --क्तं {@--1@} A lonely or solitary place; विविक्तादृते नान्यदुत्सुकस्य शरणमस्ति <ls>V. 2</ls>, <ls>Ś. 5. 5</ls>, <ls>Śi. 8. 70.</ls> {@--2@} Loneliness, privacy, seclusion. --क्ता An unlucky or ill-fated woman, one disliked by her husband ( दुर्भगा).
